popularityCurve.label: in those two matches the crowd was obviously against me

but it was a fun match i enjoyed myself it was a good fight
it would have been an entertaining game to watch but it wasn't that good being on the losing side

all his style did was make for an ugly stinky fight to watch and it was even more ugly to participate in it takes two to make a good fight and i couldn't give anything to make it a good fight i felt like i stunk out the joint that night
i won big money on that fight
nobody wanted a kenny florian-sean sherk rematch right after that fight

you remember my fight with tommy because of a moment you think of tommy's fight with marvin hagler and you remember a moment and you think of ali and frazier and ali and foreman and all of the other legendary fights because they had moments this fight has to have one too and i think it will
but you're comparing it to one of the greatest fights of all time whether you saw it on tv or were there in person so they're both going to have to bring their a games in order to match it
i was kind of dumbfounded that it was a match
it was a really tough match
i wanted that fight so bad that they could have chopped my arm off and i still would have taken that fight
i never told anybody or said anything after the fight because it's a fight i knew it was going to be a fight
oh gawd i didn't expect you to fight back that much but i guess it was the only way
